          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A nemzettudat kialakulása</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Forming Of Nationalism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Formung Von Nationalismus</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A nemzettudat kialakulása Európában - keleti és nyugati eltérések</string>
            <string language="en-US">The national conscience taking shape in Europe - eastern and western differences</string>
          </description>

            <string language="en-US">18th century</string>

          <description>

- in den östlichen und westlichen Unterschieden nimmt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La conscience nationale se dessinant dans des 
différences orientales et occidentales de l'Europe -</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conscience nacional que faz exame da forma em

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La conciencia nacional que toma dimensión de una
